com.tranek.chivalryserverbrowser

Class ServerFilters

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tranek.chivalryserverbrowser.ServerFilters

  • public class ServerFilters
extends java.lang.Object
    A data structure class that holds all of the server filters for a ServerListInterface.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected boolean hideEmpty
      Hide empty servers filter.
      protected boolean hideFull
      Hide full servers filter.
      protected boolean hidePassword
      Hide passworded servers filter.

      Maximum ping filter.
      protected int maxRank
      Maximum rank filter.
      protected int minRank
      Minimum rank filter.
      protected java.lang.String name
      Server name filter.
      protected int numThreads
      Number of threads to query the servers with.
      protected boolean officialservers
      Show only official servers filter.
      protected int perspective
      Server's allowed player perspectives filter.
      protected java.lang.String type
      Game mode filter.

        name - the server name filter

        hidepassword - hide passworded servers filter

        hidefull - hide full servers filter
        officialservers - show only official servers filter
        perspective - the server's allowed player perspectives
        numthreads - the number of threads to query the servers with
